summary: A doctor performs a small miracle with cigar smoke. A soldier performs heroics in his lovemaking. A deaf man awakens to discover a snake has slithered down his throat. A poacher becomes his own victim.
cast: Juraj Paulen|Anton Vaculík|Vilma Cibulková|Csongor Kassai|Jirí Pecha|Jakub Rada|Lukas Miskovic|Ivan Martinka|Marián Labuda|Jan Kraus|Vera Galatíková|Viera Topinkova|Bayasgalan Battsengel|Vit Bednárik|Peter Bzdúch|Daniel Dangl|Mátyás Dráfi|Andrej Fiala|Ivan Gontko|Ivo Heller|Eva Hlavácová|Andrej Jursa|Lubo Kostelný|Emil Kosír|Laura Kovalová|Dominika Krchnáková|Ján Kudlicka|Jaroslav Kunes|Tomás Köszeghy|Lukás Latinák|Igor Latta|Marian Marko|Ján Melkovic|Patrik Minar|Stefan Misovic|Attila Mokos|Ludovit Moravcik|Dorota Nvotová|Ivan Palúch|Viera Pavlíková|Stanislav Pitonák|Sofia Polanska|Lotar Radványi|Marta Raslová|Ivan Romancík|József Ropog|Vladimir Sadilek|Jirí Schmitzer|Jana Segesová|Karol Simon|Anna Sisková|Eva Vecerová|Juraj Viljkovsky|Milan Vojtela|Ludovít Vörös
title: Krajinka
